Thanks @gchanan and @arogozhnikov! I've a initial version implementing setstate/getstate in torch.dtype class but it didn't get invoked inside copy. After looking at https://github.com/numpy/numpy/blob/master/numpy/core/src/multiarray/descriptor.c#L3869, it's possible that I need to add tp_new method for the class to reconstruct.
Let me know if you have a better idea to implement this!
